Liushutong characters (6)

犂字的基本解释

犂
lí
同“犁”。

犂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》郎奚切，平齊，來。］
［《廣韻》力脂切，平脂，來。］
亦作“犁1”。亦作“1”。
(1)耕地翻土的农具。
(2)耕。
(3)摧毁，平毁。
(4)释然；豁然。参见“犂然”。
(5)杂色。
(6)指杂色牛。
(7)通“黧”。黑色。参见“犂老”、“犂黑”。
(8)通“離”。分开。
(9)通“黎”。比及。
(10)通“黎”。众多。参见“犂元”。
(11)通“剺”。参见“犂面”。
(12)量词。表示雨量相当于一犁入土的深度。
(13)姓。春秋齐有犁弥。见《左传·定公九年》。

犂字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　犂； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页701第20
【廣韻】郎奚切【集韻】【韻會】憐題切，?音黎。【玉篇】耕具也。【廣韻】墾田器。山海經曰：後稷之孫叔均所作。魏略曰：皇甫隆爲燉煌太守，敎民作樓犂。【管子·乗馬篇】丈夫二犂，童五尺一犂。【正字通】宋淳化五年，武允成獻踏犂一具，不用牛，以人力運。　又【廣韻】耕也。【前漢·匈奴傳】犂其庭。【註】師古曰：犂，耕也。　又【史記·呂后紀】犂明。【註】徐廣曰：犂猶比也，將明之時。又【南越傳】犂旦，城中皆降伏波。【註】徐廣曰：呂靜云：犂，結也。結猶連及逮至也。又【史記·犂旦註】索隱曰：犂，黑也。天未明而尚黑也。　又【史記·歷書】祝犂協洽。【註】祝犂，巳也。　又【前漢·匈奴傳】其國稱之曰撐犂孤塗單于。匈奴謂天爲撐犂，謂子爲孤塗。又【汲冢周書】孅犂。【註】北狄之別名。【史記·秦本紀】丹犂臣蜀。【註】丹犂，二戎號也。臣伏於蜀。又【匈奴傳】薪犂之國。【前漢·西域傳】蒲犂國王治蒲犂國。　又地名。【左傳·哀十年】取犂及轅。【註】犂，一名隰濟，南有隰隂縣。又【史記·西南夷傳】以

plow
Basic explanation of words
plow
lí
Same as "plough".
plow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lí]
["Guang Yun" Lang Xi cut, level, come. ]
["Guangyun" Lizhi cut, flat fat, come. ]
Also known as "Plow 1". Also known as "1".
(1) Farm tools for plowing arable land.
(2) Plowing.
(3) Destroy and destroy.
(4) Relief; Suddenly. See "Plowing Ran".
(5) Variety.
(6) Refers to variegated cattle.
(7) Through "Mu". black. See "Plow old", "Plow black".
(8) Through "Li". separate.
(9) Link "Li". Than.
(10) Link "Li". numerous. See "Plow Yuan".
(11) Through "剺". See "plough surface".
(12) Quantifiers. Indicates that the amount of rainfall is equivalent to the depth of a plow into the soil.
(13) Last name. There are plows in the spring and autumn. See "Zuo Zhuan · Ding Gong Nine Years".
plow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Bull Character Department] 　 Li; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: Page 701 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Lang Xiqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Pity the question,? Yin Li. [Jade articles] Farming tools also. [Guangyun] Reclamation equipment. Shan Hai Jing said: Hou Ji's Sun Shu all made it. Wei Lue said: Huangfulong was the prefect of Suihuang, and taught the people as a plow. [Guanzi·Riding a Horse] The husband used two plows, and the child had five plows with one plow. [Zhengzitong] In Song Chunhua five years ago, Wu Yuncheng offered a plow instead of cattle, but used manpower to transport it.　[Guang Yun] Geng Ye. [Previous Han · Xiongnu Biography] Plowing its court. [Note] Shi Gu said: Plowing, ploughing.　[History·Lv Huji] Li Ming. [Note] Xu Guang said: Plowing is still more than that, and the time will come. And [Nan Yue Chuan] Li Dan, the city is all surrendered. [Note] Xu Guang said: Lv Jingyun: Plough, knot. The knot still connects and catches it. Also [Historical Records·Li Dan's Note] Suo Yin said: Plow, black also. The sky is still dark but still dark.　[Historical Records·Almanac] Zhu Li cooperates. [Note] Zhu Li, Si Ye.　 [Previous Han·Xiongnu Biography] Its national name is Zeng Li Gu Tu Shan Yu. The Xiongnu called the sky to support the plow, and the son to gutu. Also【Jizhong Zhoushu】Sole plow. [Note] The alias of Bei Di. [Historical Records·Qin Benji] Dan Lichen Shu. [Note] Danli, Errong. The minister fell in Shu. Also [The Biography of the Xiongnu] The Land of Plowing. [Previous Han · Western Regions Biography] King Puli governed the Puli country.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·Sorrow for Ten Years] Take the plow and the shaft. [Note] Plow, a Xiji, has Xiyin County in the south. Also [Historical Records · Southwest Yi Biography]
